body_html:
Thanks. I realize it looks a bit like a nothing. However, since the repo keepers are (rightly) suggesting that our 3rd party code remains out of the main repo - I think it is important to have a sensible and clean way of integrating it. Having to make edits to other BUILD files, where there are many more targets, seems messy.

It is a shame that there isn't a 'find and include a target if it exists' option in bazel. I played around with a few possibilities, but as you can see in the conversations in the my original pull requests, they were considered more messy than this way.

I'll add a README.md file to that directory.
